RACE.RACE_TEXT: CHARLES TOWN RACE 1 4 1/2F Dirt CR: 73. Claiming Purse 9700. FOR FILLIES AND MARES FOUR YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE JANUARY 13, 2022. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since January 13, 2022 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CHARM WEAVER ducked in and made contact with Ms Big Spring leaving the gate then pressured the pace, raced close off the rail through the turn and dug in to take over late yards. CAPTAIN SAM took the lead at the half mile pole and set a pressured pace, rounded the turn near the rail, dug in under steady stretch encouragement but reluctantly ceded late yards. SECRET AFFIRMATION gave chase outside, rounded the turn in the four path and ran evenly down the lane. BIG AL'S GAL chased through the backstretch, raced off the rail on the turn then flattened the final sixteenth. WINDSOR'S CHAMPION gave chase inside and faded at the rail on the turn. MARY'S LISTED NEXT was bumped at the break, gave chase through the backstretch then eased outward on the turn, left the turn about the five path but had little left. MS BIG SPRING was bumped inward and into Mary's Listed Next, picked up the chase leaving the chute, but was never a factor.

ENTRY.NAME: Windsor's Champion
ENTRY.OWNER: Brown Nicole and Brown Ronney W

ENTRY.NAME: Charm Weaver
ENTRY.COMMENT: ducked in,bumped break,pressed pace,dug in lane,up late

ENTRY.NAME: Captain Sam
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace,rail turn,reluctantly ceded late yards

RACE.RACE_TEXT: CHARLES TOWN RACE 2 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 65. Allowance Purse 35100. FOR ACCREDITED WEST VIRGINIA-BRED FILLIES THREE YEARS OLD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Weight, 122 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since November 13 Allowed 4 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Weigh t Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BELLA MELA rated the pace inside, was pressured nearing the quarter pole and widened at the rail on the turn, then held on under steady stretch handling. IMPRESSIONISM settled off the rail on the opening turn then eased outward into the backstretch, started a bid leaving the three eighths pole, raced near the rail on the far turn, eased three wide into the lane, dueled clear for second inside the sixteenth pole and was gaining on the winner late. KEEP ON SPURRIN rated close inside, picked up the chase toward the three eighths pole, raced off the rail on the far turn then flattened the final sixteenth. LUCKY BLONDE stalked off the rail, challenged approaching the three eighths pole but dropped back toward the quarter and flattened at the rail on the far turn. BEST VIRGINIA rounded the first turn about the three path, picked up the chase nearing the seven sixteenths pole but weakened in the three path of the far turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Bella Mela
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated pace inside,pressured near 1/4,widened turn,held on driving

RACE.RACE_TEXT: CHARLES TOWN RACE 3 4 1/2F Dirt CR: 54. Maiden Special Weight Purse 32700. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Weight, 124 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SIZZLING HOT gave chase through the backstretch and raced near the rail on the turn, dug in for the lead later yards and ran clear under the wire. SEAP pressured the pace and took the lead in the three path at the quarter pole, dueled clear midway on the turn and dug in from the head of the lane, but was caught in later yards. TALENTED CORINNA chased through the backstretch, rounded the turn off the rail, was eased outward toward the head of the stretch and ran evenly down the lane. LINDA'S TAJ chased, rounded the turn off the rail then flattened stride inside the eighth pole. MIDSUMMER NIGHTS gave chase, rounded the turn about the three path and showed little in the lane. MY SILVER LADY came away a bit awkwardly then hustled to the lead and set a pressured pace, was met at the quarter pole and gave way in the three path of the turn. T J STORM VISION raced well back and never factored. RADAGAST gave chase, raced near the rail on the turn, never factored and was vanned off.

ENTRY.NAME: Seap
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace,up 3p 1/4,clear mid turn,caught later yards

ENTRY.NAME: My Silver Lady
ENTRY.COMMENT: awkward break,hustled to front,met 1/4,gave way 3p turn

ENTRY.NAME: Sizzling Hot
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased,rail turn,dug in lane,up later yards,clear wire

ENTRY.NAME: Talented Corinna
ENTRY.OWNER: Campbell Kim and Brown Ronney W
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased,off rail turn,eased out near 1/8,evenly lane

RACE.RACE_TEXT: CHARLES TOWN RACE 4 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 61. Claiming Purse 14500. FOR ACCREDITED WEST VIRGINIA-BRED FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since December 13 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000, if for $4,500, allowed 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: A FAREWELL YODEL took the lead approaching the three quarter pole and rated the pace, came under pressure leaving the three eighths pole, was met and dueled at a close disadvantage nearest the rail on the far turn, but dug in determinedly to inch ahead of POSTED through later yards, while the latter stalked off the rail leaving the first turn, challenged toward the three eighths pole and contested the edge two deep on the far turn, dueled gamely leaving the turn but relented the final sixteenth. TYRY TYRANNOSAURUS settled in the two and three paths, picked up the chase leaving the seven sixteenths pole and raced two deep on the far turn, then dueled through the stretch for third. CHASE LIL ME saved ground on the first turn, gave chase nearing the seven sixteenths pole and rounded the far turn at the rail, then outfinished in the stretch duel for third. MASTER THIS saved ground racing well off the pace, picked up the chase leaving the seven sixteenths pole, rounded the far turn off the rail, drifted leaving the turn and showed little more. MASTER YOO showed little response.

ENTRY.NAME: Master This
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground,chased 7/16,off rail far turn,drifted 1/8,empty lane

RACE.RACE_TEXT: CHARLES TOWN RACE 5 4 1/2F Dirt CR: 60. Maiden Special Weight Purse 32700. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES THREE YEARS OLD. Weight, 122 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MANAGED MISCHIEF quickly cleared the field and angled to the inside to show the way, raced near the rail on the turn and was kept sharp through the lane. LUCKY BOP chased through the backstretch, rounded the turn in the three path, was eased to the six path leaving the turn and dug in to take second later yards. CALERA LOVE chased, rounded the turn about the three path then flattened later yards. IMAGINE RITA gave chase inside, raced near the rail on the turn and ran evenly in the lane. BLACK DIAMOND RAIN chased through the backstretch, raced in the five path of the turn, angled in at the head of the lane and finished evenly. COWGIRL HOP saved ground. COSMIC REWIND gave only brief chase before being pulled up lame, and was vanned off.

ENTRY.NAME: Managed Mischief
ENTRY.COMMENT: quickly cleared,pace inside,rail turn,kept sharp lane

RACE.RACE_TEXT: CHARLES TOWN RACE 6 1 1/16M Dirt CR: 68. Claiming Purse 16200. FOR FILLIES AND MARES FOUR YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE JULY 13, 2022. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since July 13 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000, if for $4,500, allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $4,000 Or Less Not Considered In Eligibility)(W V A Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: THUNDERTURTLE rounded the first turn four wide and settled off the pace from the seven eighths pole, bid leaving the seven sixteenths and raced close two deep on the far turn, dueled at even terms leaving the turn and took the nod in the final yards. PARTY MONSTER rated a slim lead inside, came under pressure and raced at mostly even terms leaving the three eighths pole, dueled clear of Fonda Romana past the quarter, dug in to the challenge of the winner at that point and reluctantly yielded the final yards. LIFE IN FLASH came away awkwardly and settled in the three path, bid leaving the three eighths pole, raced close in the four path of the far turn, finished well and just missed second. MISS HEART saved ground, bid leaving the three eighths pole and raced near the rail on the far turn and could only improve her position. SHE FIGURES settled off the pace inside, picked up the chase leaving the half mile pole, rounded the far turn in the three path and showed little more. UPSY DAISY DO rated off the rail and was through early. FONDA ROMANA stalked the early pace from the three path then challenged and dueled with a slim brief lead leaving the half mile pole, but dropped back into the far turn and gave way in the lane.

ENTRY.NAME: Miss Heart
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground,bid leaving 3/8,rail far turn,improved position

ENTRY.NAME: She Figures
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace inside,chased past 1/2,3p far turn,little lane

ENTRY.NAME: Party Monster
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated slim lead,met 3/8,dueled clear past 1/4,ceded late yards

RACE.RACE_TEXT: CHARLES TOWN RACE 7 4 1/2F Dirt CR: 85. Allowance Purse 33900. FOR FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, WAIVER CLAIMING, RESTRICTED OR STATE BRED RACES OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since December 13 Allowed 2 lbs. A Ra ce Since November 13 Allowed 4 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances)(W V A Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MR TINGLES rated the pace inside, came under pressure toward the quarter pole and was steadily handled in the lane. E J'S REVENGE chased inside, raced off the rail on the turn and dug in through the stretch to take second the final strides. MAJESTIC SEAS chased through the backstretch and raced close off the rail on the turn, dug in leaving the turn but was nipped from second the final strides. BUSTIN PIETRE chased, raced at the rail on the turn and ran evenly in the lane. GOLDEN G chased and rounded the turn about the five path, then ran evenly to late stretch before flattening stride. ALWAYS DRINKING chased the early pace outside, moved inward on the turn then flattened stride. REY O REYES chased outside, rounded the turn about the five path and flattened in the lane. Per Stewards ruling #13, Mr Tingles has been disqualified from earnings - mds

ENTRY.NAME: E J's Revenge
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased inside,off rail turn,dug in lane,up 2nd final strides

ENTRY.NAME: Majestic Seas
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased,close off rail turn,nipped 2nd final strides

ENTRY.NAME: Always Drinking
ENTRY.OWNER: Brown Ronney W and Shake and Bake Racing LLC

RACE.RACE_TEXT: CHARLES TOWN RACE 8 7F Dirt CR: 65. Maiden Special Weight Purse 32700. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD. Weight, 122 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DAREDAVITE rated off the early pace inside, started a bid leaving the seven sixteenths pole and raced close four wide on the far turn, dug in from the eighth pole and took the lead in the final yards. MIGHTY MINION became fractious in the gate, raced with the early pace inside then stalked leaving the first turn, bid past the seven sixteenths pole, contested the far turn near the rail, dug in to a brief slim lead past the sixteenth pole but was caught in the final yards. ARROGANT RIDER tapered in and raced with the early pace three wide, dueled with a slim lead leaving the half mile pole, was met past the five sixteenths but remained a close factor two deep on the far turn, dug in leaving the turn and held on for third. HOME SCHOOL raced with the early pace two deep then stalked into the first turn, bid leaving the seven sixteenths pole, raced close in the three path of the far turn and ran evenly in the stretch. URBAN BANDIT raced with the pace three wide on the opening turn, gave chase toward the three eighths pole and took the lead passing the five sixteenths, contested the edge nearest the rail on the far turn, was caught just inside the sixteenth pole and flattened late yards. REAL RAMBO settled in the three path the first turn, gave chase leaving the seven sixteenths pole and raced near the rail on the far turn, was blocked past the eighth pole but finished evenly. SHE'S MYBUDDYBUDDY saved ground well back from early contention, picked up the chase leaving the three eighths pole, rounded the far turn at the rail, angled to the outside past the eighth pole and ran evenly in the lane. CHROME HEIR settled off the rail the first turn, gave chase leaving the half mile pole, raced in the five path of the far turn and showed little in the lane. MALIBU ROCK STAR hesitated leaving the gate then closed toward contention and raced close five wide on the first turn, gave chase leaving the half mile pole but dropped back past the three eighths and faded in the three path of the far turn. SHARP STYLE rounded the first turn in the three path then faded through the backstretch.

ENTRY.NAME: She's Mybuddybuddy
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground,chased 3/8,rail far turn,angled out lane,even finish

ENTRY.NAME: Daredavite
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated inside,bid 7/16,close 4wd far turn,up final yards

ENTRY.NAME: Malibu Rock Star
ENTRY.COMMENT: hesitated break,closed to contention,chased 1/2,faded 3p far turn

ENTRY.NAME: Arrogant Rider
ENTRY.COMMENT: with pace 3wd,slim lead past 1/2,met 5/16,close turn,held on 3rd

ENTRY.NAME: Real Rambo
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace 3p,chased 7/16,rail far turn,blocked past 1/8,even fnish
